ygData.subject: RE: Level 43 song - Desperate Dirge
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah... I had the same thing happen to me once - saved my life.  I had just finished polishing off a harrier in south karana.  I was looting the body, when
ygData.messageBody:
> Speaking of which, the bug where you continue to play songs
> when knocked unconcious extends to spellcasting too. I saw
> someone start to cast a heal spell on himself, get knocked
> unconcious, successfully channel and get the spell off, and
> pop up as he healed himself.

Yeah... I had the same thing happen to me once - saved my life. I had just
finished polishing off a harrier in south karana. I was looting the body,
when another harrier jumped me. He got a couple sweet hits on me that drove
me below one bubble of health (I was heavily damaged to begin with). I
immediately tried to Fear + Chain him (this was my first mistake - I should
have just zoned). Needless to say, it didn't work to well. He hit me a
couple more times and I went down cold. Immediately afterwards, Appalling
Screech fired and it "stuck". The harrier took off and I slowly regained my
feet. I quickly busted out my drum and boogied to Lake Rathe while uttering
a prayer of thanks to Bristlebane.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
